title: Tacos
itunes:title: Tacos
description:
In this episode, Bobby & Sophie come together in the kitchen to make a taco bar with all the fixings! We hear about what makes for a good tortilla, what their favorite toppings are, and even where tacos fit into the way we think about American cuisine.

To stay up to date on Always Hungry, follow the hosts on Instagram:

Bobby Flay's Instagram page: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay's Instagram page: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
